If you're seeing this page, you're either me (sup Bonesaw!) or you installed this extension somehow. While I haven't ruled out making a fully-integrated version of this for other streamers to leverage, I haven't done that either. You can't customize this.

So there's nothing here for you, but Twitch mandates I have this page for my extension. Mild apologies for any inconvenience.
